meanings.definition: The quality or state of being primitive.
meanings.sent1: The primitiveness of the tools showed how basic they were.
meanings.sent2: The tribe's primitiveness was evident in their simple way of life.
meanings.sent3: Despite the primitiveness of the design, the machine worked surprisingly well.
meanings.sent4: Her primitiveness in technology made her struggle with using a smartphone.
meanings.sent5: The primitiveness of the cave paintings gave insight into ancient civilizations.

meanings.definition: The condition of being in an early stage of development or evolution.
meanings.sent1: The primitiveness of the species made them vulnerable to predators.
meanings.sent2: The primitiveness of the language indicated its origins in ancient times.
meanings.sent3: The primitiveness of the computer system made it seem like a relic from the past.
meanings.sent4: The primitiveness of the technology was a hindrance to progress.
meanings.sent5: The primitiveness of the plant species allowed it to adapt to harsh environments.
